org.oddjob

Class OddjobBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oddjob.OddjobBuilder

  • public class OddjobBuilder
extends Object
    Builds an Oddjob from properties. Used by Main and Oddjob's Ant task.
    Author:
    rob
